title: Police story 3: super cop
creator_credit: Stanley Tong, Raymond Chow, Leonard Ho, Golden Way and Golden Harvest
brief_description: Chan Kong-sang, or as westerners know him, “Jackie Chan”, is the maverick cop Ka Kui who goes undercover to investigate covert arms and drug deals between mainland China and Hong Kong. Michelle Yeoh plays his partner Yeung and together they embark on an action-packed adventure which is full of amazing stunts and daredevil feats that will leave you on the edge of your seat. In Mandarin with English subtitles.
